name: Temple of Apshai: Curse of Ra
overview: Temple of Apshai was the first game in Automated Simulations' Dunjonquest series, which span ten individual titles, including expansions, smaller games, and a full sequel, Hellfire Warrior. The add-on, Curse of Ra, required the original Temple of Apshai program to run. The level design and room descriptions for both were created by Tim Bird, Mark Madrid and Andrew Martin. Curse of Ra is set in ancient Egypt and has higher difficulty. It also consists of four dungeon levels, with 179 rooms total.
